titleStmt.title: The crost couple, or A good misfortune. Which in a pleasant ditty discovers, the fortunate cross of a couple of lovers. To a new Northern tune, much in fashion.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F Coles T Vere J Wright and J Clarke,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Ille tell you a take no stranger than true ..."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

person.persName: F Coles T Vere J Wright
